TIPS.hint.0: To show individual dicerolls without adding the values together, write each dice formula in double square brackets like this: [[d4]] [[d8]] [[d12]].
TIPS.hint.1: To make a clickable button that rolls in chat, write your diceroll formula inside double brackets like this: [[/r 1d6+4]].
TIPS.hint.2: To create an actor that has a different token image every time you use it, click the Prototype Token button, then add a wildcard path to Token Image Path.
TIPS.hint.3: Players can't see journal entries by default. Give them access: right click a journal entry, select configure permissions, and choose Observer from the appropriate dropdown.
TIPS.hint.4: You can add links to other entities in a journal entry by simply dragging and dropping the other entity into the body of the journal entry.
